author: norman
msg: Fix generic STARTTLS. Thx to Stefano to help me out via Skype (JAMES-290 , JAMES-924)

author: gbrown
msg: Don't perform layout in a callback; instead, validate the display when the current AWT event is finished processing and when a queued callback finishes executing (this eliminates the repaint flicker introduced by Apple's recent changes to event processing in Java 6).

author: tabish
msg: Update TimeUnit to use new Thread sleep and join methods and the update Mutex.wait method.
And some more tests to the LockSupport Test and properly calculate the parkNanos timeout.
